content:
Hello, I wanted to tackle this issue as my first contribution to Clippy : https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/3661
There is an old PR that wasn't merged due to inactivity, so I tried to use its code as a basis for a new PR. However there has been an update in the fields of LateContext, and I would like to know how to do the appropriate modifications (the tables field doesn't exist, so we can't use tables.exp_ty()).
Mmh actually scratch that, I think I found it after reviewing the common tools document :-)
Well I have opened my first PR on Clippy :tada:. Thank you for being my rubber ducks in this small experiment :-)
I also opened a small PR to update the docs that still referred to the tables field in LateContext.
